Movie.Title: The Grand Escape
Movie.Synopsis: Five friends embark on a daring escape from a mysterious island.

Movie.Title: Lost in Time
Movie.Synopsis: A scientist discovers a way to travel through time, but things go awry.

Movie.Title: Under the Stars
Movie.Synopsis: Two strangers meet and share a night of adventure under the stars.

Movie.Title: Ghost of the Mansion
Movie.Synopsis: A group of friends explore an abandoned mansion, only to find it's haunted.

Movie.Title: Code of Silence
Movie.Synopsis: A detective must break the code of silence that exists among criminals to solve a case.

Movie.Title: Alien Encounter
Movie.Synopsis: After a mysterious spacecraft lands on Earth, a team is assembled to investigate.

Movie.Title: Run for Freedom
Movie.Synopsis: A historical drama about a slave's perilous journey to freedom.

Movie.Title: Edge of Tomorrow
Movie.Synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world, survivors fight to reclaim Earth from alien invaders.

Movie.Title: The Last Poet
Movie.Synopsis: The story of the last surviving poet in a dystopian society where art is banned.

Movie.Title: Quest for the Unknown
Movie.Synopsis: An epic adventure of a group of explorers searching for a mythical land.
